firmware.name: v3.2b7-3G 5D Shield-Accelerated
firmware.description: This is the specific firmware to support the 3G 5D Shield with *experimental* acceleration. WARNING: Requires Extruder Controller firmware 3.0 or newer. Requires ReplicatorG 0031 (or newer). Please upgrade all 3 (Motherboard, Extruders, ReplicatorG) at this time.
